source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_SEQ_00<tab>789th Order Dustman Bo Bu would take issue with Zo Ga's wealth distribution, or lack thereof.
target: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_SEQ_00<tab>第789洞穴団の採掘地のダストマン789 ボ・ブは、許しがたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_SEQ_01<tab>Bo Bu is incensed at Zo Ga's mining methods, which involve the fugleman employing his considerable resources and influence to open new veins of ore and bleed them dry before handing them over to lesser orders. In the latest effort to that end, he has employed diggers fashioned for him under duress by the accomplished metalworkers of the 86th Order. At the dustman's request, consult with Ba Go and find a way to thwart Zo Ga's efforts and narrow the gap between the haves and have<var 1F /var>nots.
target: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_SEQ_01<tab>ダストマン789 ボ・ブは、第13洞穴団が<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E93C201 /var>によって功績をあげるのを、快く思っていないようだ。<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E93C201 /var>を破壊する方法を、第789洞穴団の採掘地の「アコライト789 バ・ゴ」に相談しよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_SEQ_02<tab>Caring little for Zo Ga's aspirations but much for making things go boom, Ba Go gleefully furnishes you with some of his beauties, as well as pieces of flickering coal that will serve to guide the bombs to their target. Seek out the Model 86 digger in U'Ghamaro and lay the coals beside it.
target: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_SEQ_02<tab>アコライト789 バ・ゴに相談すると、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897F01 /var>で<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E93C201 /var>を破壊する方法を教えてくれた。まずは、ウ・ガマロ武装鉱山の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E93C201 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897E01 /var>」を設置しよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_SEQ_03<tab>With the coals in place, Ba Go's beauties will surely not mistake their target. Back away to a safe location, let them fly, and enjoy the fireworks to follow.
target: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E93C201 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897E01 /var>を設置した。付近にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E93C801 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897F01 /var>」を設置し、爆発させよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_SEQ_04<tab>You have generated an explosion that would have made Ba Go proud. Make your way back to the 789th Order Dig and report the deed to Bo Bu.
target: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897F01 /var>で<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E93C201 /var>を破壊した。第789洞穴団の採掘地の「ダストマン789 ボ・ブ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_SEQ_05<tab>Bo Bu is overjoyed to hear of your success, relishing the knowledge that the 789th will be competing on even terms with Zo Ga's favored ones, at least for the day. Though the young dustman at times suffers from overzealousness, you would not be averse to seeing his ambition rub off on his peers...
target: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_SEQ_05<tab>ダストマン789 ボ・ブに、<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E93C201 /var>を破壊したことを報告した。彼はコボルド族の頂点に立つために、やる気をみなぎらせているようだ。その熱気が第789洞穴団に浸透するように、支援を続けてあげよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_TODO_00<tab>Speak with 789th Order Acolyte Ba Go.
target: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_TODO_00<tab>アコライト789 バ・ゴと話す

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_TODO_01<tab>Place flickering coals beside the Model 86 digger.
target: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_TODO_01<tab>ウ・ガマロ武装鉱山の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E93C201 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897E01 /var>を設置

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_TODO_02<tab>From a safe location, release the smart bombs.
target: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_TODO_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E93C801 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E897F01 /var>を設置し爆発させる

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_TODO_03<tab>Report to 789th Order Dustman Bo Bu.
target: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_TODO_03<tab>ダストマン789 ボ・ブに報告

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BOBU_000_000<tab>Sneaky, shifty Zo Ga will stop at nothing to tighten his grip on the tunnels. No, no, his twisted ambition knows no bounds.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BOBU_000_000ゾ・ガの欲望　とどまるところを知らないのであーる。
最新型の「」を独占し
新しい鉱脈を　掘り当てようとしているのであーる！

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BOBU_000_001<tab>Zo Ga knows his mining abilities are ordinary─average, middling, ordinary. And so he monopolizes the richest veins, bleeds them dry before others can so much as sniff the treasures within.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BOBU_000_001「」の独占は　鉱脈の独占　富の独占！
ヤツーラだけが豊かになるなーど
断じーて　許さないのであーる！

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BOBU_000_002<tab>Machinists of the 86th make new rock eaters for Zo Ga, but they are not to blame. No, no, Zo Ga threatens to take their food if his bidding is not done.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BOBU_000_002しかーし　ヤツーラもさるもーの
「」の頑丈さーは　ワガハイから見ても完璧……。
簡単にーは　壊せそうにないのであーる。

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BOBU_000_003<tab>Every tunnel, every vein Zo Ga opens, one path, one dream is closed to us. You will speak to Ba Go and see what can be done. You will─yes, yes, you must!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BOBU_000_003「アコライト789バ・ゴ」の爆弾ならーば
「」の破壊も　なるかもしれぬのであーる。
アヤーツから　話を聞くのであーる。

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BOBU_000_004<tab>Every tunnel, every vein Zo Ga opens, one path, one dream is closed to us. You will speak to Ba Go and see what can be done. You will─yes, yes, you must!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BOBU_000_004「アコライト789バ・ゴ」の爆弾ならーば
「」の破壊もなるかもしれぬのであーる。
アヤーツから　話を聞くのであーる。

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BAGO_000_010<tab>Zo Ga wants more shinies? Zo Ga can have them. Ba Go has his beauties, and that is enough─yes, yes, more than enough for Ba Go.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BAGO_000_010ククク……「」は　たしかに頑丈だーね。
あれほどの物を壊すとなるーと……これかーな？
とっておきの新作爆弾ちゃん　使うしかないーね。

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BAGO_000_011<tab>But will Ba Go say no to making booms in Zo Ga's tunnels? No, no, Ba Go who says no would not be Ba Go. So Ba Go gives you brightstones and beauties. You have seen these before, yes? Yes, yes, you know what to do.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BAGO_000_011「」を設置しーて
「」を飛ばしてドッカンすれーば
かたーい「」もイチコローよ……ククク。

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BAGO_000_012<tab>Put down brightstones, stand back, and let beauties fly free. Beauties fly, fly into the light, and Zo Ga's metal beast goes boom. Zo Ga's friends will not be happy, but Ba Go will be! Haha! Haheaheaheahaeheah!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BAGO_000_012ただ「」は　目立つのーよ。
「」守ってる「」やってくーる。
気をつけーて。

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BAGO_000_015<tab>Put down brightstones, stand back, and let beauties fly free. Beauties fly, fly into the light, and Zo Ga's metal beast goes boom. Zo Ga's friends will not be happy, but Ba Go will be! Haha! Haheaheaheahaeheah!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BAGO_000_015「ウ・ガマロ武装鉱山」にあーる　「」に
「」を設置しーて
「」を飛ばしてドッカーン……ククク。

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BOBU_000_030<tab>You have done well, friend! A blast and a boom, and the playing field is leveled─flattened, evened, leveled. Yes, yes, now skill and smarts will win out over chicanery.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BOBU_000_030よくやってくれたのであーる。
オヌーシ　つくづーく　ワガハイの役に立つーね。
ヒトながーら　見上げた者なのであーる。

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BOBU_000_031<tab>It is only a matter of time─moons, days, time─until Bo Bu rises to his rightful position of power. Yes, yes, before long you will be calling me 1st Order Exemplar Bo Bu!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BOBU_000_031この調子でゾ・ガの野望を　打ち砕いーて
ワガハイが　コボルド族の頂点に立つためーに
その手伝いをしてほしいのであーる！
TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_POPMESSAGE_000_002<tab>その行動は出現した敵を倒さないと実行できません

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_KOBOLD01370_000_040<tab>(-13th Order Patrolman-)This is Zo Ga's! Keep your dirty paws off!
target: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_KOBOLD01370_000_040<tab>(-13オーダー・パトロールマン-)オレたーちの　<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E93C201 /var>に　何すーる！

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_KOBOLD01370_000_041<tab>(-13th Order Patrolman-)Hands off! Don't touch! Keep back!
target: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_KOBOLD01370_000_041<tab>(-13オーダー・パトロールマン-)こーら！　そいつに触るーんじゃ　なーい！

source: TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_KOBOLD01370_000_042<tab>(-13th Order Patrolman-)Overdweller! I'll bring your head to Zo Ga on a platter─a dish, a plate, a platter!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_KOBOLD01370_000_042(-13オーダー・パトロールマン-)ヒトーだぁ！　ヒトーがいーる！
こんなところーで　何してやがーる！？

source:
TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BALLOON_000_050You won't return alive!
No, no, you won't!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB307_01370_BALLOON_000_050このヤローウ！
生かしーて　帰さなーい！
